name: Echolocate
description:
How do you play?

In Echolocate you play as a bat which uses echolocation to navigate a level. The aim it to try and reach the end of the level, avoiding any hazards along the way (some which may be moving...).

What is echolocate?

Echolocate is a small playable prototype of a silly game idea I had which was thrown together in my spare time in about a week. I've also heard it's pretty hard

Attributions

Bat chirp: "Noisy_Miner_Chick_FeedMe.Wav" by digifishmusic of Freesound.org (https://freesound.org/people/digifishmusic/sounds/83295/)

Water Drip: "Dripping, Fast, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org (https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/343764/)

Metal Clang: "ANI Big Pipe Hit" by ani_music of Freesound.org (https://freesound.org/people/ani_music/sounds/244983/)
